data.text: @JerryMoran A simple sign that Jerry is a coward.  He speaks out about a mean tweet, but can’t find a single word to admonish his peers and his donors satanic behavior on Epstein’s island.   #Jerryisacoward
@JerryMoran Cowardly behavior, as usual, from JM. https://t.co/Qb42hs89y9

@JerryMoran Hey RINO. We are going to vote you out of office. When our granddaughters have to wear a burka it’s your fault. When we have to listen to the call for Muslim prayer; It’s your fault🤬 Nuke the filibuster and pass the SAVE Act right now. You have failed America by being a RINO and
@JerryMoran Guess you managed to pull your big boy pants up to your knees for once. The GOP needs to grow up and defend this country from Trump's erratic dangerous behavior!

@robglee @JerryMoran i have known about trumpty dumpty from years ago,lived near nyc,vile,disgusting,and I do condemn him, always have..if u can findany Howard S. broadcasts, u wouldlearn somuch more abt trump & he is a "sick" man.
@JerryMoran It’s not who we are as a nation, but it’s who the Trump administration has always been and who you are a member of a Republican Party that can’t stand up to him 🤷‍♂️
